bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2006 regarding appropriations to the Board of Regents and the Department of Corrections.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2006 regarding appropriations to the Board of Regents. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 13 of chapter 30 of the 2005 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS University of South Dakota School of Medicine Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$10,032,263" and insert "$10,732,263" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete $7,417,467" and insert "$7,667,467" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$6,635,911" and insert "$6,779,938" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$3,067,626" and insert $3,573,599" F.T.E., delete "360.1" and insert "382.1" Adjust all totals accordingly. South Dakota University Proper Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$3,639,831" and insert "$4,619,831" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$12,061,290" and insert "$14,239,362" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$41,788,147" and insert "$43,044,547" Adjust all totals accordingly. Black Hills State University F.T.E., delete "413.4" and insert "417.9" Adjust all totals accordingly. Dakota State University Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$417,624" and insert "$617,624" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$1,711,124" and insert "$2,111,124" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$7,089,266" and insert "$7,164,266" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$7,225,718" and insert "$7,290,718" F.T.E., delete "258.5" and insert "264.5" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. The effective date of this Act is June 21, 2006.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2006 regarding appropriations to the Board of Regents and the Department of Corrections. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 13 of chapter 30 of the 2005 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS University of South Dakota School of Medicine Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$10,032,263" and insert "$10,732,263" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete $7,417,467" and insert "$7,667,467" Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$6,635,911" and insert "$6,779,938" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$3,067,626" and insert $3,573,599" F.T.E., delete "360.1" and insert "382.1" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 15 of chapter 30 of the 2005 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS Pheasantland Industries Personal Services, Other Funds, delete "$585,754" and insert "$685,754" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$2,272,548" and insert "$3,772,548" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. The effective date of this Act is June 21, 2006.
